about_the_game:
Lotus: Lost Memories is a pixel art side-scrolling adventure with a unique take on turn-based combat! Experience a fresh blend of strategy and action, with Quick Time Events that add a dynamic edge to each battle.

Step into the richly woven tale of Atsushi, a young samurai bound by duty to his ailing father. Navigate alliances, rivalries, and dark secrets from a hidden past that threaten to alter his path. Undertake a journey of loyalty, honor, and betrayal as he faces skilled adversaries and uncovers the echoes of a legacy that will shape his destiny.

Experience a fresh take on turn-based combat. Engage in calculated battles where timing and strategy are everything. Master QTE (Quick Time Events) to give yourself an edge in combat. Dodge, block, or unleash a ranged attack to turn the tide of battle.

Encounter a cast of intriguing allies and enigmatic foes, each with their own motives and hidden agendas. As Atsushi build alliances and face betrayals, every interaction brings him closer to an inevitable showdown with a mysterious figure from his past, one whose intentions could alter your path forever.

content_descriptors.notes: There is blood and a little bit of alcohol. Mostly in scenes of taverns and bars.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Athlon II X4 640
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
